name: db
description: Neste repositorio iremos criar uma base de dados para o projeto Meteorological-Data-Collector.

scripts.DB: npx prisma generate --schema "./src/prisma/schema.prisma" && ts-node-dev src/RestartDatabase.ts && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema "./src/prisma/schema.prisma"
scripts.DB:Deploy: npx prisma generate --schema "./src/prisma/schema.prisma" && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema "./src/prisma/schema.prisma"
